description:
Hadis` enemies are conspiring against him. Jill has secretly worked out a plan to protect him, but she`s locked inside a barrier and Rave won`t let her out. Instead, he tells her the real reason she was chosen as the Dragon Consort.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Kon`yaku Aite ni Chikayoru Yakara ga Ita no de, Kaeriuchi ni Shite Yaritai to Omoimasu
Upstarts Are Attempting to Get Close to My Fiance and I Want to Beat Them at Their Own Game
婚約相手に近寄る輩がいたので, 返り討ちにしてやりたいと思います
